sentences.sContent: A syrupy acid obtained by oxidation of glycerol or glyceraldehyde .
sentences.sContent_eng: A syrupy acid obtained by oxidation of glycerol or glyceraldehyde .
sentences.sCn: 一种浆状的酸，由甘油和甘油醛氧化后获得。

sentences.sContent: It might sound weird, but glycerol and water make great analogs for the exploding cloud of supernova matter!
sentences.sContent_eng: It might sound weird, but glycerol and water make great analogs for the exploding cloud of supernova matter!
sentences.sCn: 这听起来可能很奇怪，但甘油和水是超新星物质爆发云团的极好的近似物。

trans.tranOther: a colourless or pale yellow odourless sweet-tasting syrupy liquid; 1,2,3-propanetriol: a by-product of soap manufacture, used as a solvent, antifreeze, plasticizer, and sweetener (E422)
